subject: Whether to use junitee or cactus ?
msgSnippet: I don t know this question is appropriate here . i have written some code that uses junit 4.x (i.e. with Annotations). I works fine when i run it on netbeans
messageBody:
I don't know this question is appropriate here . i have written some code
that uses junit 4.x (i.e. with Annotations). I works fine when i run it on
netbeans IDE. i am using junit-4.6.jar. But it throws a
"junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in Test" when i run
through junitee or cactus servlets. I think junitee has no support for
junit4.x in its servlet runner. But i dont know whether cactus has the
support for running junit4.x test classes. Please advice!...

Regards
pjerald.
